drops.name: Gem drop table
drops.drop_requirements: <ref>Only accessed if the player is not doing an uninterruptible action.</ref>

drops.name: Gorak claws
drops.drop_requirements: <ref name="ReferenceA">Only dropped if [[Fairytale II - Cure a Queen]] has been partially completed.</ref>

drops.name: Clue scroll (hard)

drops.name: Long bone
drops.drop_requirements: {{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/704316647708950528|date=29 Feb 2016|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/FSnrM|archivedate=25 Mar 2019|quote=All creatures with big bones use the same rates: 1/400 for the long bone, 1/5k for the curvy one.|name=special bones}}

drops.name: Gorak claws
drops.drop_requirements: <ref name="ReferenceA">Only dropped if [[Fairytale II - Cure a Queen]] has been partially completed.</ref>

drops.name: Gem drop table
drops.drop_requirements: {{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/636147724186951680|quote=[Goraks] have a 5/128 chance of hitting the gem table.|date = [[25 August]] [[2015]]}}

drops.name: Looting bag
drops.drop_requirements: <ref>Only dropped by those found in the [[Wilderness]].</ref>

drops.name: Ecumenical key
drops.drop_requirements: <ref>Only dropped by those located in the [[Wilderness God Wars Dungeon]]. Drop rate decreases to 1/70 if one key is owned, and 1/80 if two are owned. If the medium or hard [[Wilderness Diary]] is completed the drop rate of 1/60 still applies until a player owns two or three keys, respectively.</ref>

drops.name: Clue scroll (hard)
drops.drop_requirements: {{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Tide|url=https://twitter.com/JagexTide/status/1131933683714330624|date=24 May 2019|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/WUqwD|archivedate=24 May 2019|quote=I know its been a while since the clue expansion but here is the information on clue scroll drop rates and loot chances! If anything changes I will keep you posted.|name=Clue rates tweet}}<ref>Twice as common if a [[Ring of wealth (i)]] is worn and fought in the [[Wilderness]].</ref>
